heading: Fun facts
lines: Solarized, the color scheme in user here has many unique properties such as reducing eye-fatigue.
The site is fully navigable and accessible using only a keyboard, if you're into that sort of thing.
An old iteration of this portfolio, built with vanilla JS is preserved at https://vjs.dhruvkb.now.sh/.
